descriptionRaw: For the rest of the game, all of your Elemental spells and Skills deal 1 extra damage.
flavorText: "In the hands of the wise, water shapes all." - Dedicant of Wisdom
name: Deluge

description: When you spend mana to play another unit, create a random card in hand of equal cost. It costs 0 and is <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When you spend mana to play another unit, create a random card in hand of equal cost. It costs 0 and is Fleeting.
flavorText: Despite its appetite for even the strangest sea-beasts, there are some monsters even Bilgewater's most experienced captains won't hunt. They speak of Sefirsa in whispered tones, as a hypnotic light moving deep beneath the waves; a monster perched upon a mass grave of sunken ships and drowned men.
name: Sefirsa, Scourge of the Deep

description: When you play a card with cost equal to my Power, grant me +1|+1.
descriptionRaw: When you play a card with cost equal to my Power, grant me +1|+1.
flavorText: "Say, uh, dontcha want to put some more down? No risk, no reward, ya know. This is a lucky table tonight, I'll tell ya. And the house deals fair at this fine establishment--swear it on my mama's tongue."
name: Honest Croupier

description: When you spend mana to play a unit, refill 1 spell mana.
descriptionRaw: When you spend mana to play a unit, refill 1 spell mana.
flavorText: "The reef has long been both shelter and ally. It cares for us, as we care for it, so that neither will fall to the darkness of the Murk." - Marai Greatmother
name: Marai Reef Spire

description: When I'm summoned, create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Slipstream</style></link> in the top 6 cards of your deck.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, create a Slipstream in the top 6 cards of your deck.
flavorText: "Look, my friends, at how the whole world moves with us! The waves dance beneath the hull, the wind in the sails, the birds upon the breeze. Join me in our highest calling, and rejoice!"
name: Vikrash the Exuberant

description:
Summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Galesong Swallow</style></link> and grant it +1|+1 for each other Elemental spell and <link=keyword.Elemental Skill><sprite name=ElementalSkill><style=Keyword>Skill</style></link> you've played this game. <style=Variable></style>
Draw 1.
descriptionRaw:
Summon a Galesong Swallow and grant it +1|+1 for each other Elemental spell and Skill you've played this game. 
Draw 1.
flavorText: When galesong swallows gather in numbers, a storm is never far off.
name: Galesong Flock

description: Pick an allied follower. Transform my bearer into an exact copy of it while I'm equipped.
descriptionRaw: Pick an allied follower. Transform my bearer into an exact copy of it while I'm equipped.
flavorText: Don't ask how these work.
name: Shady Spectacles

description: <link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link>: Grant a random 6+ cost spell in hand "When I'm played, summon a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Prototype Porobot</style></link>."
descriptionRaw: Last Breath: Grant a random 6+ cost spell in hand "When I'm played, summon a Prototype Porobot."
flavorText: "It's just a prototype," the apprentice cried as flames engulfed the lab. "I didn't program it to eat every gear in sight! I don't even know where all that metal is GOING!"
name: Prototype Porobot

description:
Give an ally +2|+0 this round.
Draw 2.
descriptionRaw:
Give an ally +2|+0 this round.
Draw 2.
flavorText: "Be at peace! The storm may rage around you, but it shall not harm you." - Janna
name: Eye Of The Storm

description:
If you've drawn 3+ cards this round, I cost 2 less.
Deal 3 to a unit and 2 to the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw:
If you've drawn 3+ cards this round, I cost 2 less.
Deal 3 to a unit and 2 to the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: "The tempest is at my command." - Janna
name: Divine Whirlwind

description: When you play a spell, draw 1. When you draw while you have a full hand, deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw: When you play a spell, draw 1. When you draw while you have a full hand, deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: Zaun demands adaptation--and the chemtech drake is no exception, cast in the sickly green light of augmentation as it clings to the underbelly of the city. The twin shadows of the drake's ruined wings loom along darkened passageways, harbingers of a fury born from anguish at its own corruption.
name: Chemtech Drake

description:
<link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: <link=vocab.Updraft><style=Vocab>Updraft</style></link> 2 to draw 2 at the next <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>.
Each round, the first 3 times you draw a card, reduce its cost by 1 this round. <style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw:
Play: Updraft 2 to draw 2 at the next Round Start.
Each round, the first 3 times you draw a card, reduce its cost by 1 this round.
levelupDescription: I've seen you play 8 cost reduced cards.<style=Variable></style>
levelupDescriptionRaw: I've seen you play 8 cost reduced cards.
flavorText: "Zaun is closer to Janna than pretty much anywhere else. After all, she's the one who saved the poor souls Piltover left to die. Yeah--if there's answers to be had, I'll get 'em here." - Windborne Mariner
name: Janna

description:
<link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Draw 1.
When you draw a card, reduce its cost by 1 this round.
descriptionRaw:
Round Start: Draw 1.
When you draw a card, reduce its cost by 1 this round.
flavorText: "Go no further! Violate my protection and you shall see the breath torn from your lungs, and your very self scattered by the winds!"
name: Janna

description:
Give an ally +2|+0 this round.
Draw 2.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Janna</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Give an ally +2|+0 this round.
Draw 2.
Create a Janna in your deck.
flavorText: "Be at peace! The storm may rage around you, but it shall not harm you." - Janna
name: Janna's Eye Of The Storm

description: Summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Galesong Swallow</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Summon a Galesong Swallow.
flavorText: "All children of the wind answer my call." - Janna
name: Galesong Call

description: When you play an Elemental spell or <link=keyword.Elemental Skill><sprite name=ElementalSkill><style=Keyword>Skill</style></link>, copy it with the same targets.
descriptionRaw: When you play an Elemental spell or Skill, copy it with the same targets.
flavorText: "Come, Iascylla! You are old indeed, if Ashlesh knows your name. But old or young, pretty or ugly, no matter. There is no higher honor for any monster than to fall to my blade upon the open sea." - Nilah
name: Iascylla, Figurehead of the Deep

description: If you've drawn 3+ cards this round, I cost 2 less.
descriptionRaw: If you've drawn 3+ cards this round, I cost 2 less.
flavorText: "Yeah, I had what I wanted. But I got it all by taking, and taking leaves a man empty. First thing I found to follow was the wind, so now I'm here, hoping she'll push me onto a better path."
name: Windborne Mariner

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: <link=vocab.Updraft><style=Vocab>Updraft</style></link> 1 to either draw 1 or refill your spell mana.
descriptionRaw: Play: Updraft 1 to either draw 1 or refill your spell mana.
flavorText: Convinced that she was saved by the wind spirit as a young girl, Maryam has preached Janna's virtues from her home country of Shurima all the way to Zaun. Now serving as the Zaun temple matriarch, she is dedicated to passing forward Janna's kindness to the young and downtrodden.
name: Maryam, Temple Caretaker

flavorText: "These galesong swallows are flighty creatures. Half the time they seem to be made up entirely of water! Still, I've learned the hard way to avoid upsetting them..." - Intrepid Mariner
name: Galesong Swallow

description:
<link=vocab.RoundEnd><style=Vocab>Round End</style></link>: <link=vocab.Updraft><style=Vocab>Updraft</style></link> your hand. 
<link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Draw that many cards plus 1.
descriptionRaw:
Round End: Updraft your hand. 
Round Start: Draw that many cards plus 1.
flavorText: Much was lost in the disastrous collapse that ultimately delineated Zaun from Piltover. Janna may have lost her temple to the waves, but she saved the people who worshipped in it.
name: Sunken Temple

description:
Deal 2 to a unit.
Increase my damage by 1 for each other card you've played this round, up to 3 times. <style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw:
Deal 2 to a unit.
Increase my damage by 1 for each other card you've played this round, up to 3 times.
flavorText: "My fury upon howling winds!" - Janna
name: Howling Gale

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: <link=vocab.Updraft><style=Vocab>Updraft</style></link> 1 to refill your spell mana.
descriptionRaw: Play: Updraft 1 to refill your spell mana.
flavorText: Convinced that she was saved by the wind spirit as a young girl, Maryam has preached Janna's virtues from her home country of Shurima all the way to Zaun. Now serving as the Zaun temple matriarch, she is dedicated to passing forward Janna's kindness to the young and downtrodden.
name: Maryam, Temple Caretaker

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: <link=vocab.Updraft><style=Vocab>Updraft</style></link> 1 to draw 1.
descriptionRaw: Play: Updraft 1 to draw 1.
flavorText: Convinced that she was saved by the wind spirit as a young girl, Maryam has preached Janna's virtues from her home country of Shurima all the way to Zaun. Now serving as the Zaun temple matriarch, she is dedicated to passing forward Janna's kindness to the young and downtrodden.
name: Maryam, Temple Caretaker

description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: ALL players draw 1, then grant your opponent's card <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Round Start: ALL players draw 1, then grant your opponent's card Fleeting.
flavorText: "It's two for one today, and today only! Fresh fish, caught just this...uh, month? Two for one! What do you mean you don't want the second one? It's free!"
name: Charlatan Fishmonger

description:
If you've drawn 3+ cards this round, I cost 2 less.
When I'm summoned, draw 2 at the next <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>.
descriptionRaw:
If you've drawn 3+ cards this round, I cost 2 less.
When I'm summoned, draw 2 at the next Round Start.
flavorText: "My dear Zephyr. Come down from your clouds and perch on my shoulder awhile, won't you?" - Janna
name: Exalted Cloudwinder

description:
Draw 1.
Summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Sigil of the Storm</style></link>.
descriptionRaw:
Draw 1.
Summon a Sigil of the Storm.
flavorText: "In the name of Valhir, we make this offering..." - Valhir's Prophet
name: Invocation Of Thunder

description: When you play a <link=keyword.Slow><sprite name=Slow><style=Keyword>Slow</style></link> spell that targets a single ally, copy it onto me.
descriptionRaw: When you play a Slow spell that targets a single ally, copy it onto me.
flavorText: "You think an arrow or two will stop me? Hah! Whatever you throw at me becomes a weapon in my arsenal. Whatever is lost I will reforge in ice!"
name: Bladebound Berserker

description: Give an ally +1|+3 this round.
descriptionRaw: Give an ally +1|+3 this round.
flavorText: Cloaked in clouds and wreathed in lightning, the god-bear stands untouchable at the heart of the storm.
name: Sky Splitter

description: <link=keyword.Elemental Skill><sprite name=ElementalSkill><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: Play <link=card.skill><style=AssociatedCard>Relentless Storm</style></link> 3 times. Each one targets a different random enemy or the enemy Nexus if none.
descriptionRaw: Play: Play Relentless Storm 3 times. Each one targets a different random enemy or the enemy Nexus if none.
flavorText: "Kneel to me, mortal, and I may spare you! Your power is feeble, but perhaps worthy enough to serve mine. Kneel, or be swept from the earth!"
name: Volibear

description: Deal 4 to a unit. If it's dead or gone, deal 2 to the enemy Nexus instead.
descriptionRaw: Deal 4 to a unit. If it's dead or gone, deal 2 to the enemy Nexus instead.
flavorText: "With these claws, I carve the very world!" - Volibear
name: Relentless Storm

description:
Deal 4 to ALL units except <link=vocab.Titanic><style=Vocab>Titanic</style></link> allies.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Volibear</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Deal 4 to ALL units except Titanic allies.
Create a Volibear in your deck.
flavorText: "Let the tundra run red!" - Volibear
name: Volibear's Stormbringer

description:
<link=keyword.Elemental Skill><sprite name=ElementalSkill><style=Keyword>Play</style></link> or <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Play <link=card.skill><style=AssociatedCard>Relentless Storm</style></link> 3 times. Each one targets a different random enemy or the enemy Nexus if none.
Other allies have <link=keyword.Overwhelm><sprite name=Overwhelm><style=Keyword>Overwhelm</style></link>.
descriptionRaw:
Play or Attack: Play Relentless Storm 3 times. Each one targets a different random enemy or the enemy Nexus if none.
Other allies have Overwhelm.
flavorText: "You dare to insult me with a challenge? Puny girl from lands far away. I am the heart of the tundra! I am the storm, and to you I promise a forgettable death!"
name: Volibear

description:
Summon 2 random <link=vocab.Titanic><style=Vocab>Titanic</style></link> followers.
I cost 1 less for each Elemental spell or <link=keyword.Elemental Skill><sprite name=ElementalSkill><style=Keyword>Skill</style></link> you've played this game <nobr>(max 10).
descriptionRaw:
Summon 2 random Titanic followers.
I cost 1 less for each Elemental spell or Skill you've played this game (max 10).
flavorText: "With his body, I sculpted the mountains. With the fire of his maw, I carved a thousand fjords." - Volibear
name: Clash of Giants

description: When you play an Elemental spell or <link=keyword.Elemental Skill><sprite name=ElementalSkill><style=Keyword>Skill</style></link>, <link=vocab.Forge><style=Vocab>Forge</style></link> me.
descriptionRaw: When you play an Elemental spell or Skill, Forge me.
flavorText: "The Forgelord promised change and hammered out the chains of inaction instead. Those who worship a weak god are weak themselves. Only by Valhir's might will we be delivered to the glory of old!"
name: Flamecaller Caprine

description: Deal 4 to ALL units except <link=vocab.Titanic><style=Vocab>Titanic</style></link> allies.
descriptionRaw: Deal 4 to ALL units except Titanic allies.
flavorText: "Let the tundra run red!" - Volibear
name: Stormbringer

description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Grant the top 2 allies in your deck +1|+1.
descriptionRaw: Attack: Grant the top 2 allies in your deck +1|+1.
flavorText: Though they originating from Yadulsk, these pups have been domesticated by a number of Freljordian tribes for tracking, hunting, and avalanche recovery. With a hearty constitution and a healthy appetite for fun, they are beloved from tundra to taiga.
name: Yadulski Snowdog

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Summon 3 <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Sigils of the Storm</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Play: Summon 3 Sigils of the Storm.
flavorText: Though few still worship him, all Freljordians know the tale of the Volibear's great battle with Rhond. Long before any mortal stepped foot in the frozen north, this earth-shattering struggle formed the ridges and rivers of the tundra itself.
name: Rhond, the Magma Serpent

description: When I'm summoned, summon 2 <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Frozen Thralls</style></link> and <link=vocab.Advance><style=Vocab>advance</style></link> them <nobr>to 2.</nobr>
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, summon 2 Frozen Thralls and advance them to 2.
flavorText: "She was v-vicious! Thralls burnt to black ice, avalanches beneath her claws, a roar that knocked snow off the mountains! A warrior queen, I tell you! K-killing thralls is the work of a warrior queen." - Babbling Bjerg
name: Boadir of Blackened Ice

description: When I'm summoned, summon an <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Sigil of the Storm</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, summon an Sigil of the Storm.
flavorText: "I see what the others cannot: the storm which will shatter the mountain, the breaking of the bones of the earth. The Freljord of old will be forged anew in blood--it is only a matter of time."
name: Valhir's Prophet

description:
Sigils of the Storm stack.
<link=vocab.Titanic><style=Vocab>Titanic</style></link> allies cost <style=Variable>1</style> less. Destroy me when you play a <link=vocab.Titanic><style=Vocab>Titanic</style></link> ally.
descriptionRaw:
Sigils of the Storm stack.
Titanic allies cost 1 less. Destroy me when you play a Titanic ally.
flavorText: In a treacherous mountain pass, a sigil hangs suspended, burning into the night. Much blood was offered to reach this point, and in signs like these the Volibear offers both his approval and his desire for more...
name: Sigil of the Storm

description: I have +1|+0 for each different subtype you've summoned this game. <style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw: I have +1|+0 for each different subtype you've summoned this game.
flavorText: "There are beasts up here that even an avalanche won't stop. That's why a good harness is worth every coin." - Avarosan Trapper
name: Handy Harness

description: When you play a spell or <link=keyword.Skill><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword>Skill</style></link>, summon an <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Sigil of the Storm</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When you play a spell or Skill, summon an Sigil of the Storm.
flavorText: Occasionally, followers of the Volibear lose themselves so totally in their fanaticism that they begin to take on aspects of the bear himself. Nothing will stand in the way of Valhir's will--not even those the Ursine once called countrymen.
name: Berserker Ursine

description:
<link=vocab.Origin><style=Vocab>Origin</style></link>: <link=card.origin><style=AssociatedCard>Aspect of the Dragon</style></link>. <style=Variable></style>
I cost 1 less for each different Dragon Boon you've played this game.
<link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: Play every Dragon Boon on me.
descriptionRaw:
Origin: Aspect of the Dragon. 
I cost 1 less for each different Dragon Boon you've played this game.
Play: Play every Dragon Boon on me.
levelupDescription: Your allies have attacked with 75+ total Power. <style=Variable></style>
levelupDescriptionRaw: Your allies have attacked with 75+ total Power.
flavorText: "Legend has it that this dragon is the oldest of all--that he is king of all winged beasts. If we tame him... why, Alatis, what else could possibly stand in our way? The world will finally understand that man and dragon are strongest together." - Volix, Dragon Allegiant
name: Elder Dragon

description: Grant +1|+0 and <link=keyword.Fearsome><sprite name=Fearsome><style=Keyword>Fearsome</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Grant +1|+0 and Fearsome.
flavorText: The flames of infernal wrath rise ever higher.
name: Infernal Might

description: You may put any followers that cost 6+ into your deck during deckbuilding. When you play a unit with 6+ base cost, pick 1 of 2 Dragon Boons to play on it.
descriptionRaw: You may put any followers that cost 6+ into your deck during deckbuilding. When you play a unit with 6+ base cost, pick 1 of 2 Dragon Boons to play on it.
flavorText: Dragons bestow blessings both awesome and terrible.
name: Aspect of the Dragon

description: I CANNOT BE STOPPED
descriptionRaw: I CANNOT BE STOPPED
flavorText: Heat without equal poured from the Elder Dragon's maw. Alatis leapt into flight. "Stand fast," Volix cried. "Hold your lines! The world will know us as the men who tamed the king of beasts!"
name: Elder Dragon

description: Grant +1|+0 and <link=keyword.Impact><sprite name=Impact><style=Keyword>Impact</style></link> twice.
descriptionRaw: Grant +1|+0 and Impact twice.
flavorText: What nature designs, hextech improves.
name: Hextech Prowess

description: Grant <link=keyword.Deathless><sprite name=Deathless><style=Keyword>Deathless</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Grant Deathless.
flavorText: What some call poison, others call power.
name: Chemtech Blight

description: Grant <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenger</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Grant Challenger.
flavorText: Nimble as the breeze, decisive as the gale.
name: Cloudbringer's Grace

description: Grant +1|+0 and  <link=keyword.Tough><sprite name=Tough><style=Keyword>Tough</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Grant +1|+0 and  Tough.
flavorText: The mountainous hide weathers any storm.
name: Mountainous Vigor

description:
Refill your mana to full. Draw all 6+ cost followers from the top 6 cards of your deck.
Create an <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Elder Dragon</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Refill your mana to full. Draw all 6+ cost followers from the top 6 cards of your deck.
Create an Elder Dragon in your deck.
flavorText: "This call--it is primeval. I see a kingdom of clouds. I see an awful winged host." - Ottrani Dragon-Worshiper
name: Elder Dragon's Primordial Roar

description: Heal allies and your Nexus 2.
descriptionRaw: Heal allies and your Nexus 2.
flavorText: These wings of water wash all wounds.
name: Oceanic Will

description: Refill your mana to full. Draw all 6+ cost followers from the top 6 cards of your deck.
descriptionRaw: Refill your mana to full. Draw all 6+ cost followers from the top 6 cards of your deck.
flavorText: "This call--it is primeval. I see a kingdom of clouds. I see an awful winged host." - Ottrani Dragon-Worshiper
name: Primordial Roar

description: <link=keyword.Elemental Skill><sprite name=ElementalSkill><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: Deal 2 to an enemy and 2 to the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw: Play: Deal 2 to an enemy and 2 to the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: Noxian expansion has claimed many different peoples, settlements, and cultures. Frequently, wild creatures are also at the mercy of the war machine--but in the case of this dragon, each brutal step forward by Noxus is met with an equally brutal inferno of rage.
name: Enraged Firespitter

description: Deal 2 to an enemy and 2 to the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw: Deal 2 to an enemy and 2 to the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: Wood, steel, flesh--all of it melts in proximity to the firespitter's caustic rage.
name: Spitfire

description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: Deal 3 to an ally to deal 3 to an enemy.
descriptionRaw: Play: Deal 3 to an ally to deal 3 to an enemy.
flavorText: "Tear their souls from the cages of their bodies!" - Mordekaiser
name: Iron Legionary

description: Deal 3 to an ally to deal 3 to an enemy.
descriptionRaw: Deal 3 to an ally to deal 3 to an enemy.
flavorText: "It cuts... it hurts... in this realm and the next... and the next..." - Shackled Ghasts
name: Soul Cleaver

description: Deal 1 to the enemy Nexus, increased by 1 for each other <link=card.selfref><style=AssociatedCard>Wildfire</style></link> you've played. Create a <link=card.selfref><style=AssociatedCard>Wildfire</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw: Deal 1 to the enemy Nexus, increased by 1 for each other Wildfire you've played. Create a Wildfire in your deck.
flavorText: "Ashes, ashes..." - Annie
name: Wildfire

description: Grant an ally <link=keyword.Deathless><sprite name=Deathless><style=Keyword>Deathless</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Grant an ally Deathless.
flavorText: "Eternal iron." - Mordekaiser
name: Indestructible

description: <link=vocab.NexusStrike><style=Vocab>Nexus Strike</style></link>: <link=keyword.Curse><sprite name=Curse><style=Keyword>Curse</style></link> your opponent with <link=card.curse><style=AssociatedCard>Ichor</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Nexus Strike: Curse your opponent with Ichor.
flavorText: While useful to the Noxian war machine, the razormace is also prized in the capitol's fighting pits. Few opponents--human or animal--are willing to take to the arena against this beast, and so the razormace's rare battles draw crowds from across the city.
name: Red-Barbed Razormace

description: While I'm in hand, <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Deal <style=Variable>1</style> to your Nexus.
descriptionRaw: While I'm in hand, Round Start: Deal 1 to your Nexus.
flavorText: You're bleeding. It's slow... but it shows no signs of stopping.
name: Ichor

description: Allied <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link> and <link=keyword.Support><style=Keyword>Support</style></link> effects activate an additional time.
descriptionRaw: Allied Attack and Support effects activate an additional time.
flavorText: Headmistress Telsi's class on personal discipline is rife with arduous assignments, wrist-slapping, and detention slips. It has always been mandatory for students at the Ravenbloom Conservatory--otherwise, nobody would enroll.
name: Headmistress Telsi

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Pick an Explorer spell to create in hand.
descriptionRaw: Play: Pick an Explorer spell to create in hand.
flavorText: "You'd think it would be easier to dig in the desert--but no! Given enough time, sand readily turns to stone. Once again requesting funding for replacement tools." - From the expedition records of the Explorer's Guild Far Reaches Division, allocation: Shurima
name: Armed Acquisitioner

description: Kill a unit if it's damaged, otherwise deal 2 to it instead.
descriptionRaw: Kill a unit if it's damaged, otherwise deal 2 to it instead.
flavorText: "This is in your best interest. Trust me." - Lord Broadmane
name: Kashuri Swipe

flavorText: "It took centuries of planning to seal away that dreadful warmonger--and your pathetic friends intend to defeat him with 'joy'? You foolish girl. You will do nothing but incur the Revenant's wrath--and in doing, risk us all."
name: Lord Mallat

description: When an ally is revived, grant it <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenger</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When an ally is revived, grant it Challenger.
flavorText: "You smile, but I know the truth of your traitorous heart! They smiled to my face and ate from my table, even as they meant to put a sword through my back. I won't be taken for a fool again. You will die like the rest of them: screaming your apology!"
name: Bladepierced Revenant

description: <link=keyword.Curse><sprite name=Curse><style=Keyword>Curse</style></link> an enemy with <link=card.curse><style=AssociatedCard>Terror</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Curse an enemy with Terror.
flavorText: Some things are best left beneath the sands.
name: Ancient Malediction

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Grant two enemies -1|-0 and disable their positive keywords.
descriptionRaw: Play: Grant two enemies -1|-0 and disable their positive keywords.
flavorText: Despite its intimidating size, this swarmcaller is rarely violent. When its swarm nears a Shuriman settlement, villagers will leave offerings of soft fruit in the nearby desert to distract their visitors from more important crops.
name: Horned Swarmcaller

description: <link=keyword.Daybreak><style=Keyword>Daybreak</style></link> or when you activate another <link=keyword.Daybreak><style=Keyword>Daybreak</style></link>: Grant the <link=keyword.Weakest><style=Keyword>weakest</style></link> enemy <link=keyword.Vulnerable><sprite name=Vulnerable><style=Keyword>Vulnerable</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Daybreak or when you activate another Daybreak: Grant the weakest enemy Vulnerable.
flavorText: The vast armies of Shurima stand ready to prove the might of the desert. When the order is given, they advance without hesitation.
name: General of the Dunes

description: <link=keyword.Daybreak><style=Keyword>Daybreak</style></link>: Draw a <link=card.me><style=AssociatedCard>Defenders of the Sun Disc</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Daybreak: Draw a Defenders of the Sun Disc.
flavorText: "We are the keepers of the everlasting desert, the living history, the walkers of the path of radiance. We kneel before the Sun Disc and naught else, so that the world will kneel before Shurima's glory." - Azir
name: Defenders of the Sun Disc

description: Each round, the first time another ally dies, or <link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link>: Create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Lucky Find</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: Each round, the first time another ally dies, or Last Breath: Create a Lucky Find in hand.
flavorText: "That's a real haul, Barb. Knew I could count on you. Wait--what do you mean they saw you?!" - Vekauran Bruiser
name: Tomb-Raider Barbara

description: To play me, kill an ally or one of your mana gems 3 times.
descriptionRaw: To play me, kill an ally or one of your mana gems 3 times.
flavorText: The duneswallower slumbers at much larger depths than its smaller xer'sai cousins. Known to make an easy meal out of other xer'sai predators, it is rarely documented--likely for the fact that it can swallow entire dunes (and any witnesses) whole.
name: Dune Swallower

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: <link=keyword.Curse><sprite name=Curse><style=Keyword>Curse</style></link> an enemy with <link=card.curse><style=AssociatedCard>Shackles</style></link> twice.
descriptionRaw: Play: Curse an enemy with Shackles twice.
flavorText: "You come to me bruised and bleeding, and yet I've never seen a countenance so jubilant. You are a strange woman indeed--but you are safe here. Please rest, and when you're feeling better, I'd be keen to hear your story."
name: Morgana

description:
<link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: <link=keyword.Curse><sprite name=Curse><style=Keyword>Curse</style></link> an enemy with <link=card.curse><style=AssociatedCard>Shackles</style></link> twice.
<link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: <link=keyword.Curse><sprite name=Curse><style=Keyword>Curse</style></link> the <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>strongest</style></link> enemy that isn't <link=keyword.Curse><sprite name=Curse><style=Keyword>Cursed</style></link> with <link=card.curse><style=AssociatedCard>Shackles</style></link> and deal 3 to <link=keyword.Curse><sprite name=Curse><style=Keyword>Cursed</style></link> enemies and 2 to the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw:
Play: Curse an enemy with Shackles twice.
Attack: Curse the strongest enemy that isn't Cursed with Shackles and deal 3 to Cursed enemies and 2 to the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: "You will regret this transgression! Be assured of this if nothing else: you will feel the suffering you have inflicted on others as a vise around your very soul. You will admit your sins, or be suffocated by them."
name: Morgana

description:
<link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> an enemy and <link=keyword.Curse><sprite name=Curse><style=Keyword>Curse</style></link> it with <link=card.curse><style=AssociatedCard>Shackles</style></link>.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Morgana</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Stun an enemy and Curse it with Shackles.
Create a Morgana in your deck.
flavorText: "Suffer, as you've made them suffer!" - Morgana
name: Morgana's Dark Binding

description: While I'm in hand, <style=Variable>the cursed unit</style> is <link=keyword.Immobile><sprite name=Immobile><sprite name=Reckless><style=Keyword>Immobile</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: While I'm in hand, the cursed unit is Immobile.
flavorText: "Bound by truth!" - Morgana
name: Shackles

description: Deal 3 to <link=keyword.Curse><sprite name=Curse><style=Keyword>Cursed</style></link> enemies and 2 to the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw: Deal 3 to Cursed enemies and 2 to the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: "I am your torment, reflected a thousandfold!" - Morgana
name: Soul Shackles

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: <link=keyword.Curse><sprite name=Curse><style=Keyword>Curse</style></link> 2 enemies with <link=card.curse><style=AssociatedCard>Shackles</style></link> twice.
descriptionRaw: Play: Curse 2 enemies with Shackles twice.
flavorText: "It was in the names of my daughters that I embraced divinity. It was for my family that I forsook my own humanity, so that by this flaming sword I could forge anew a world of truth and justice."
name: Mihira, Aspect Ascendant

description:
<link=keyword.Curse><sprite name=Curse><style=Keyword>Curse</style></link> an enemy with <link=card.curse><style=AssociatedCard>Shackles</style></link>.
Increase the cost of enemy Curses <link=vocab.Everywhere><style=Vocab>everywhere</style></link> by 1.
descriptionRaw:
Curse an enemy with Shackles.
Increase the cost of enemy Curses everywhere by 1.
flavorText: "To find your freedom, admit the darkness within." - Morgana
name: Sinner's Vise

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Grant <link=keyword.SpellShield><sprite name=SpellShield><style=Keyword>SpellShield</style></link> or <link=keyword.Overwhelm><sprite name=Overwhelm><style=Keyword>Overwhelm</style></link> to an ally in hand.
descriptionRaw: Play: Grant SpellShield or Overwhelm to an ally in hand.
flavorText: "Do not be afraid! Go on, and do not look back! We made this journey once, too. Now it is our duty to protect yours. Go quickly to her sanctuary, and the Veiled One will grant you the protection you seek."
name: Ruby-Eyed Conjurer

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: <link=keyword.Curse><sprite name=Curse><style=Keyword>Curse</style></link> me with <link=card.curse><style=AssociatedCard>Shackles</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Play: Curse me with Shackles.
flavorText: The Mageseekers excelled at breaking people. They had bound his hands and his magic. They had taken his voice. But he had survived them before--and this time, he had the Veiled Lady on his side.
name: Chained Caster

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Grant <link=keyword.Overwhelm><sprite name=Overwhelm><style=Keyword>Overwhelm</style></link> to an ally in hand.
descriptionRaw: Play: Grant Overwhelm to an ally in hand.
flavorText: "Do not be afraid! Go on, and do not look back! We made this journey once, too. Now it is our duty to protect yours. Go quickly to her sanctuary, and the Veiled One will grant you the protection you seek."
name: Ruby-Eyed Conjurer

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Grant <link=keyword.SpellShield><sprite name=SpellShield><style=Keyword>SpellShield</style></link> to an ally in hand.
descriptionRaw: Play: Grant SpellShield to an ally in hand.
flavorText: "Do not be afraid! Go on, and do not look back! We made this journey once, too. Now it is our duty to protect yours. Go quickly to her sanctuary, and the Veiled One will grant you the protection you seek."
name: Ruby-Eyed Conjurer

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: <link=keyword.Curse><sprite name=Curse><style=Keyword>Curse</style></link> an enemy with <link=card.curse><style=AssociatedCard>Shackles</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Play: Curse an enemy with Shackles.
flavorText: "Look, Dolly! I'm doing it, just like you taught me! Do you think we'll ever get to show mama how much I've learned? You think she already knows? Really?! I hope you're right." - Lisa
name: Lisa and Dolly

description: When you play a <link=keyword.Fast><sprite name=Fast><style=Keyword>Fast</style></link> spell, <link=keyword.Slow><sprite name=Slow><style=Keyword>Slow</style></link> spell, or <link=keyword.Skill><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword>Skill</style></link>, grant other Dragon allies +1|+1.
descriptionRaw: When you play a Fast spell, Slow spell, or Skill, grant other Dragon allies +1|+1.
flavorText: Dragons can vary as greatly in their temperaments as they do in their appearance. For species as prone to all-consuming destruction as infernal drakes, there are those equally protective of their families and environments--like the slow-moving, affectionate gemdragon.
name: Gentle Gemdragon

description: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> an enemy and <link=keyword.Curse><sprite name=Curse><style=Keyword>Curse</style></link> it with <link=card.curse><style=AssociatedCard>Shackles</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Stun an enemy and Curse it with Shackles.
flavorText: "Suffer, as you've made them suffer!" - Morgana
name: Dark Binding

description: When I'm summoned, heal your Nexus 2 and gain an extra mana gem next round.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, heal your Nexus 2 and gain an extra mana gem next round.
flavorText: High on the slopes of Targon, a lone Ottrani has dedicated their life to dragons. They adorn themselves in shed scales and old bones, divining their path forward from the scattering of dragon teeth and the curling of smoke as it is carried up the mountain.
name: Ottrani Dragon-Worshiper

description: When I'm summoned or you summon a <link=vocab.Titanic><style=Vocab>Titanic</style></link> ally, heal your Nexus 3.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned or you summon a Titanic ally, heal your Nexus 3.
flavorText: This veiled protector has not forgotten the blessing that elevated it above a mere beast--and repays this debt by ensuring any who seek a certain sanctuary on the slopes of Targon make the journey unscathed.
name: Veiled Protector

description: Give an ally <link=keyword.SpellShield><sprite name=SpellShield><style=Keyword>Spellshield</style></link> this round and <link=keyword.Curse><sprite name=Curse><style=Keyword>Curse</style></link> it with <link=card.curse><style=AssociatedCard>Shackles</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Give an ally Spellshield this round and Curse it with Shackles.
flavorText: "Shielded from persecution!" - Morgana
name: Black Shield

description:
<link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Activate other allies' <link=keyword.Daybreak><style=Keyword>Daybreak</style></link> and <link=keyword.Nightfall><style=Keyword>Nightfall</style></link> effects.
<link=keyword.Daybreak><style=Keyword>Daybreak</style></link>: Grant me <link=keyword.Overwhelm><sprite name=Overwhelm><style=Keyword>Overwhelm</style></link>.
<link=keyword.Nightfall><style=Keyword>Nightfall</style></link>: Grant me <link=keyword.SpellShield><sprite name=SpellShield><style=Keyword>SpellShield</style></link>.
descriptionRaw:
Play: Activate other allies' Daybreak and Nightfall effects.
Daybreak: Grant me Overwhelm.
Nightfall: Grant me SpellShield.
flavorText: "A ring of fire burns above. In the heralded darkness, we are all the same." - Lunari wanespeaker
name: Herald of Celestial Convergence

description:
If you <link=vocab.Behold><style=Vocab>Behold</style></link> a <link=vocab.Titanic><style=Vocab>Titanic</style></link> unit, I cost 3 less.
Deal 7 to a unit.
descriptionRaw:
If you Behold a Titanic unit, I cost 3 less.
Deal 7 to a unit.
flavorText: "Oops, uh oh, dontcha worry about dat dere, just a little wipple in the wock, just a accident, not papa NOPE! Movin' on!" - Chip
name: Seismic Shard

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Pick an Explorer spell to create in hand.
descriptionRaw: Play: Pick an Explorer spell to create in hand.
flavorText: "It's cold. I'm cold. Everything is cold, all the time. There are some places people just aren't meant to live. Please send me somewhere warm after this." - From the expedition records of the Explorer's Guild Far Reaches Division, allocation: Freljord
name: Scholarly Pioneer

description: Grant an ally +0|+2. <link=keyword.Curse><sprite name=Curse><style=Keyword>Curse</style></link> your opponent with <link=card.curse><style=AssociatedCard>Suppression</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Grant an ally +0|+2. Curse your opponent with Suppression.
flavorText: "Know the weight of your sins!" - Morgana
name: Magical Fettering

description: When I'm summoned, <link=keyword.Curse><sprite name=Curse><style=Keyword>Curse</style></link> your opponent with <link=card.curse><style=AssociatedCard>Suppression</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, Curse your opponent with Suppression.
flavorText: "We cannot allow them to reach the sanctuary of the fallen sister. Her magic is ancient and twisted, far beyond even my ability to suppress. Quickly, take these abominations back to the ship and then up the mountain after the rest of them!"
name: Mageseeker Inquisitor

description: While I'm in hand, you can't play spells other than curses.
descriptionRaw: While I'm in hand, you can't play spells other than curses.
flavorText: No magic moves to your call.
name: Suppression

description: When I'm summoned, reduce the cost of all allied units in hand by 1.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, reduce the cost of all allied units in hand by 1.
flavorText: With thick tufted fur to insulate against the cold, this drake can reach much higher altitudes than most other dragons. Lively yet elusive, the drakes are usually spotted high overhead, wings cutting through the clouds as they jump from gust to gale.
name: Cloud Drake

description:
Give an ally +0|+2.
That ally and an enemy <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strike</style></link> each other.
descriptionRaw:
Give an ally +0|+2.
That ally and an enemy strike each other.
flavorText: "En garde, my friend! Surely you are not coward enough to refuse a gentleman's duel?" - Laurent Chevalier
name: Gentlemen's Duel

description:
When I'm summoned, draw 1 of each champion from your deck.
Each round, the first time you summon a champion, <link=vocab.Rally><style=Vocab>Rally</style></link>.
descriptionRaw:
When I'm summoned, draw 1 of each champion from your deck.
Each round, the first time you summon a champion, Rally.
flavorText: "You must remember, my son, that the chasing of any horizon must be in service to the home we leave behind." - King Jarvan III
name: The Kingfisher

description: Grant allied Birds <link=vocab.Everywhere><style=Vocab>everywhere</style></link> +1|+1. An allied Bird <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strikes</style></link> an enemy.
descriptionRaw: Grant allied Birds everywhere +1|+1. An allied Bird strikes an enemy.
flavorText: The silverwing's screech signals death from above.
name: Taloned Strike

description: Your Dragon Boons target all Dragon allies.
descriptionRaw: Your Dragon Boons target all Dragon allies.
flavorText: "To be clear, I was not always a dragon allegiant. Alatis here convinced me, the first time he saved my life. He's taught me a lot, but the most important thing? There's no finer life than serving Demacia from the back of a dragon." - Dragon Allegiant
name: Alatis the Gallant

description: When I'm summoned, draw a Dragon if you <link=vocab.Behold><style=Vocab>Behold</style></link> a Dragon.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, draw a Dragon if you Behold a Dragon.
flavorText: "You know it pains me to admit it, old boy, but we can't tame him alone. We've done what we can already. I'll send word to the general, and with the might of Demacia behind us, we're sure to bring that fantastic beast to its knees."
name: Dragon Allegiant

description: When you play a <link=keyword.Fast><sprite name=Fast><style=Keyword>Fast</style></link> spell, <link=keyword.Slow><sprite name=Slow><style=Keyword>Slow</style></link> spell, or <link=keyword.Skill><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword>Skill</style></link>, heal your Nexus 1.
descriptionRaw: When you play a Fast spell, Slow spell, or Skill, heal your Nexus 1.
flavorText: "A grand beast you are! There is joy in the skim of your claws over the waves. Should you ever decide to prey on more than fish and seabirds, I would be delighted to face you." - Nilah
name: Ocean Drake

description: Each round, the first card you play costs 9 less.
descriptionRaw: Each round, the first card you play costs 9 less.
flavorText: For the inhabitants of this Ionian village, Heisho is both honored caretaker and friend. Having carried their homes on his back from time immemorial, they can trust their village bearer to seek peaceful shores in times of trouble.
name: Heisho, Shell of the World

description: Stop an enemy <link=keyword.Fast><sprite name=Fast><style=Keyword>Fast</style></link> spell, <link=keyword.Slow><sprite name=Slow><style=Keyword>Slow</style></link> spell, or <link=keyword.Skill><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword>Skill</style></link>, <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> an enemy, and summon <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>The Empyrean</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Stop an enemy Fast spell, Slow spell, or Skill, Recall an enemy, and summon The Empyrean.
flavorText: "This dance is our remembrance." - Irelia
name: Empyrean Dance

description: When I'm summoned, summon <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Adnere's Aviarists</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, summon Adnere's Aviarists.
flavorText: "This land is full of lessons. Remember always: the passing of each season is to be celebrated, for only in the ending can a new beginning be born."
name: Trusty Adnere

description: <link=keyword.Support><style=Keyword>Support</style></link>: Grow me to my supported ally's stats this round.
descriptionRaw: Support: Grow me to my supported ally's stats this round.
flavorText:
"Look! Papa's birds are hatching again!"
"Whoa! Another one! Why are there so many?"
"You ask that EVERY year, Arya."
"Well nobody ever answers!"
"Shhh, don't scare them. And tell me how many there are, cuz we're gonna have to think of a lotta names."
name: Adnere's Aviarists

description: <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> an enemy to increase the cost of the next unit your opponent plays this round by 2.
descriptionRaw: Recall an enemy to increase the cost of the next unit your opponent plays this round by 2.
flavorText: "Those who mean us harm shall find rest at the bottom of the sea." - Rivershaper
name: Capsize

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Summon an exact <link=keyword.Ephemeral><sprite name=Ephemeral><style=Keyword>Ephemeral</style></link> copy of me.
descriptionRaw: Play: Summon an exact Ephemeral copy of me.
flavorText: During the right times of year, when the wind blows in over the sea, some Zaunites swear they can see the faint impressions of two huge finned creatures dancing joyously with the ocean tides.
name: Prancing Sea Spirits

description: Your opponent discards their highest cost card.
descriptionRaw: Your opponent discards their highest cost card.
flavorText: "Imagine being a worm, and the last thing you see before you die are those eyes. Oh, worms can't see? Well, that's probably for the best." - Elle, Aloof Traveler
name: Early Bird

description: For each <link=card.selfref><style=AssociatedCard>Bursting Backpack</style></link> you've played this game, plant 4 <link=card.boon><style=AssociatedCard>Chimes</style></link> in your deck and 4 <link=card.trap><style=AssociatedCard>Poison Puffcaps</style></link> in the enemy deck. Create a <link=card.selfref><style=AssociatedCard>Bursting Backpack</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw: For each Bursting Backpack you've played this game, plant 4 Chimes in your deck and 4 Poison Puffcaps in the enemy deck. Create a Bursting Backpack in your deck.
flavorText: "Rule 207: A Scout never carries more than she needs!" - Ava Achiever
name: Bursting Backpack

description: <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> an ally to summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Hungry Owlcat</style></link> in its place.
descriptionRaw: Recall an ally to summon a Hungry Owlcat in its place.
flavorText: "SQWUEA?" - Owlcat
name: Sneaky Swap

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Pick 1 of 2 non-champion cards from the enemy hand. I <link=keyword.Capture><sprite name=Capture><style=Keyword>Capture</style></link> it.
descriptionRaw: Play: Pick 1 of 2 non-champion cards from the enemy hand. I Capture it.
flavorText:
"Yeah, I'm handsome, quick--unflappably cool. Don't you know, old man? I'm the king of this reef, and you're trespassing in my kingdom!"
"W-wait! Come back here this instant! I need that specimen for my research!" - Conchologist
name: Skip, "King of the Reef"

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Pick an Explorer spell to create in hand.
descriptionRaw: Play: Pick an Explorer spell to create in hand.
flavorText: "I'm worried about Bunches! Oh, he seems more and more nervous these days. Even a short portal hop worries him! I can't understand why." - From the expedition records of the Explorer's Guild Far Reaches Division, allocation: Bandle City
name: Portal Pioneer

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: <link=vocab.Manifest><style=Vocab>Manifest</style></link> a <link=vocab.Titanic><style=Vocab>Titanic</style></link> follower and set its stats to 1|1 and cost to 0.
descriptionRaw: Play: Manifest a Titanic follower and set its stats to 1|1 and cost to 0.
flavorText: "Of course I know old Portia! A bit out-to-lunch, but she can get you a portal to anywhere, in a pinch. A swirl of the tail, and you're off!" - Portal Pioneer
name: Portia the Peculiar

description: Place an ally on the bottom of your deck to summon the top ally of your deck.
descriptionRaw: Place an ally on the bottom of your deck to summon the top ally of your deck.
flavorText: "Rule 571: A Scout should always be vigilant. One never knows what might be a tasty treat, and what might be a trap." - Ava Achiever
name: Sugary Snare
